text:
Doctrine | Data Scientist | Paris | Doctrine.fr | ONSITE

Doctrine is the "Google" for the case-law in France! We are a young startup with a huge growth. We are disrupting the legal market at a very VERY high pace. First in France, soon in Europe.

We use DL / NLP to automate lawyers' repetitive & boring jobs! and we have a deep focus on User Experience.

We are looking for young & smart french-speaking Data Scientists that have experience in NLP / Deep Learning.

Apply here: https://www.doctrine.fr/recrutement or see our open positions on Angel List: https://angel.co/doctrine-/jobs
